COMPELLING TITLE

Budget Visualizations

Visualization 1: Bar chart - budget vs departments

x-axis has three bars to represent revised budget, budget remaining, actual balance, y-axis has the bars grouped into departments - you can click on the bars to turn them a different color

Visualization 2: Line chart - budget changes over the years

multiple lines with a legend and different colors to represent changes in budget over the years (for datasets)

Visualizations Beyond: Use contextual datasets to produce some other visualizations we can compare to (need two of these)



do citations for the datasets!!

link the jupyter notebooks used for analysis
